### getAddressSpaceForPseudoSourceKind() {#a1a72a3512d276a263dc3f59e2c656c37}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned AMDGPUTargetMachine::getAddressSpaceForPseudoSourceKind (unsigned Kind) const"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
getAddressSpaceForPseudoSourceKind - Given the kind of memory (e.g.

stack) the target returns the corresponding address space.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-h/#l00069">69</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-h">AMDGPUTargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-cpp/#l00956">956</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-cpp">AMDGPUTargetMachine.cpp</a>.

### getAssumedAddrSpace() {#ad1a46ac397c473bc698a471c4e563695}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned AMDGPUTargetMachine::getAssumedAddrSpace (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
If the specified generic pointer could be assumed as a pointer to a specific address space, return that address space.

Under offloading programming, the offloading target may be passed with values only prepared on the host side and could assume certain properties.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-h/#l00064">64</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-h">AMDGPUTargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-cpp/#l00910">910</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-cpp">AMDGPUTargetMachine.cpp</a>.

### getPredicatedAddrSpace() {#a355d0ca715b69ab8d5c1a7fb6c241ea5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::pair&lt; const Value &#42;, unsigned &gt; AMDGPUTargetMachine::getPredicatedAddrSpace (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
If the specified predicate checks whether a generic pointer falls within a specified address space, return that generic pointer and the address space being queried.

Such predicates could be specified in @llvm.assume intrinsics for the optimizer to assume that the given generic pointer always falls within the address space based on that predicate.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-h/#l00067">67</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-h">AMDGPUTargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-cpp/#l00929">929</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-cpp">AMDGPUTargetMachine.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### splitModule() {#ae1dadcf6ee688f96abb563274e620f44}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AMDGPUTargetMachine::splitModule (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, unsigned NumParts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt; void(std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &gt; MPart)&gt; ModuleCallback)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Entry point for module splitting.

Targets can implement custom module splitting logic, mainly used by LTO for â€“lto-partitions.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
<code>true</code> if the module was split, <code>false</code> otherwise. When <code>false</code> is returned, it is assumed that <code>ModuleCallback</code> has never been called and <code>M</code> has not been modified.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-h/#l00071">71</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-h">AMDGPUTargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-cpp/#l00971">971</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-cpp">AMDGPUTargetMachine.cpp</a>.

### getNullPointerValue() {#a0cdc78a746b623575007c91573f9bd8b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int64&#95;t AMDGPUTargetMachine::getNullPointerValue (unsigned AddrSpace)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Get the integer value of a null pointer in the given address space.
